message: I throw on my clothes, wake up Ren, and run downstairs.
Granny, Koujaku, Mink, Noiz, and Clear are in the living room. Even Mr. Haga and Ms. Yoshie are there.

name: 紅雀
message: "Aoba!"

name: クリア
message: "Master!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny! The cops're outside for some reason! I mean, they're calling my name!"

name: タエ
message: "Well, this is a mess..."

name: ヨシエ
message: "Aoba, dear, what on earth is going on?"

name: 羽賀
message: "I came as soon as I finished the preparations... but it looks like I was too late."

name: ヨシエ
message: "I don't know what they want, but we're on your side!"

name: 羽賀
message: "Of course!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks. But I'm just as lost as you guys..."

name: タエ
message: "Toue is behind this."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Toue?!"

name: タエ
message: "He must've heard from Morphine, or whoever they were. He knows you used Scrap. He's not gonna waste any time coming for you."

name: 悪島
message: "Get your asses out here, already! Don't make me come in there! ...Fine! Have it your way! Brace for entry!"

name: タエ
message: "Through the back door, all of you! Hurry!"

name: 紅雀
message: "That cop means business."

name: 羽賀
message: "We'll handle things here. Please, Aoba, get your friends out the back while you can!"

name: ヨシエ
message: "Yeah! We'll give those rotten policemen a kicking they'll never forget!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mr. Haga, Ms. Yoshie... Granny, thank you."

name: 悪島
message: "CHAAAAAAAARGE!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Let's go!"
We race out the back door.
Behind us, I hear the police storming the place.
Granny, Mr. Haga, Ms. Yoshie... I'm sorry!
Please... Please be safe!
The back door leads to a narrow path sandwiched between two walls.
We slip through and into a slightly wider alley.

name: クリア
message: "There are police that way! I can hear their footsteps!"
He's right. I hear footsteps ahead of us.

name: 警官Ａ
message: "It's them! They're here!"
They found us!
We're screwed if they catch us in this alley.

name: ミンク
message: "Don't be an easy target! Scatter!"
Spurred by Mink's command, we split off in different directions.
